member.name: ITfEditTransactionSink.OnEndEditTransaction
member.summary: Indicates the end of an edit transaction.
member.param: Pointer to the interface involved in the transaction.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfEditTransactionSink.OnStartEditTransaction
member.summary: Indicates the start of an edit transaction.
member.param: Pointer to the interface involved in the transaction.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ITfEditTransactionSink
member.summary: The ITfEditTransactionSink interface is implemented by a text service and used by the TSF manager to support edit transactions. An edit transaction is a series of edits that use multiple document locks. A text service can optionally implement this interface. This advise sink is installed by calling with IID_ITfEditTransactionSink.
